doc.previous: The Army National Guard has a further eight divisions  The United States Army currently has ten active divisions
doc.after: There are two division within the Army Reserve that are responsible for training operations  The United States Marine Corps has a further three active divisions and one reserve division They consist of three infantry regiments one artillery regiment a tank battalion a Light Armored Reconnaissance battalion an Amphibious Assault Vehicle battalion a reconnaissance battalion a combat engineer battalion and a headquarters battalion
